queries: select r.partition_date as periodo, length(CONCAT(g5519_feoperac, g5519_s1emp, g5519_contra1, g5519_metaplic, g5519_fasecalc, g5519_mtm, g5519_ead, g5519_espeprov, g5519_fecultmo, g5519_impnomct, g5519_addonbru, g5519_addonnet, g5519_coefregu, g5519_metliqui, g5519_mtm_brut)) as longitud, CONCAT(g5519_feoperac, g5519_s1emp, g5519_contra1, g5519_metaplic, g5519_fasecalc, g5519_mtm, g5519_ead, g5519_espeprov, g5519_fecultmo, g5519_impnomct, g5519_addonbru, g5519_addonnet, g5519_coefregu, g5519_metliqui, g5519_mtm_brut) as detalle, from_unixtime(unix_timestamp()) as op_timestamp, d.tabla as tabla from bi_corp_bdr.jm_ead_contr r left join bi_corp_bdr.tablas_info d on d.tabla = 'JM_EAD_CONTR' where r.partition_date = '$month_partition_bdr' and length(CONCAT(g5519_feoperac, g5519_s1emp, g5519_contra1, g5519_metaplic, g5519_fasecalc, g5519_mtm, g5519_ead, g5519_espeprov, g5519_fecultmo, g5519_impnomct, g5519_addonbru, g5519_addonnet, g5519_coefregu, g5519_metliqui, g5519_mtm_brut)) != cast(d.longitud as int)
